description: This file implements a service worker for caching strategies in a web application, including install, activate, and fetch event handlers for managing cache storage and offline support.

methods.name: install event handler
methods.description: Handles the installation of the service worker, caching the app shell files.

methods.name: activate event handler
methods.description: Cleans up old caches during the service worker activation.

methods.name: fetch event handler
methods.description: Intercepts network requests to serve cached resources or fetch fresh data based on request type and origin.
